name: Restaurant-Pizzeria Edelweiß - Lounge
description: Already in the 4th generation, we spoil our guests with traditional cuisine, homemade ice cream and pizzas. Our hotel offers modern rooms and an apartment in the heart of Mayrhofen. See for yourself and enjoy a day in the sun on our large feel-terrace with a cup of coffee and a homemade apple strudel with custard! We look forward to your visit!
